de.aikiit.spamprotector.util

Class LocalizationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.aikiit.spamprotector.util.LocalizationHelper

  • public final class LocalizationHelper
extends Object
    Helper to deal with localizations and ease the usage of resource bundles within spamprotector.
    Version:
    23.08.11
    Author:
    hirsch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalizationHelper()

      static String getBundleString(String key)
      Helper function to retrieve a given key from the underlying resource bundle.
      static String getLanguage() 
      static Locale getLocale() 
      static String getParameterizedBundleString(String key, Object... parameters)
      Helper function to retrieve a given key from the underlying resource bundle while applying localization parameters.
      static void setLocale()
      Set locale depending on system properties, in case of errors fallback is Locale.GERMANY.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalizationHelper

        public LocalizationHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • setLocale

        public static void setLocale()
        Set locale depending on system properties, in case of errors fallback is Locale.GERMANY.

      • getLocale

        public static Locale getLocale()
        Returns:
        the currently set Locale of this application. Fallback is Locale.GERMANY.

      • getLanguage

        public static String getLanguage()
        Returns:
        the currently set language

      • getBundleString

        public static String getBundleString(String key)
        Helper function to retrieve a given key from the underlying resource bundle.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to retrieve from the bundle, e.g. spamprotector.foo.title
        Returns:
        Returns the value from the bundle.

      • getParameterizedBundleString

        public static String getParameterizedBundleString(String key,
                                                  Object... parameters)
        Helper function to retrieve a given key from the underlying resource bundle while applying localization parameters.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to retrieve from the bundle, e.g. fotorenamer.foo.parameteredtitle.
        parameters - Object array with all parameters.
        Returns:
        Returns the value from the bundle with the given parameters applied.
        See Also:
        I18N-tutorial
